title: Lag spikes
body:
Hey there, so the last year almost I have had a really consistent 27 ping which is great it makes a huge difference to gameplay lately though I have been getting lag spikes (up to 300ms) pretty much only as of last patch I have tried a few things but I cannot resolve it, it only happens in spikes when I get near to enemy players otherwise it is the normal 27-32 keep in mind this is only enemy players not my own team. I have tried connecting directly to my modem, flush dns and set the game to high priority on my network before I call my ISP and unleash the fury I am wondering if there is something going on with your servers or any explanation aside from my ISP experiencing problems (seeing as it is only this game that is affected I doubt it).

 I'm worried because last time this started happening it stayed that way for 2 seasons.. when you moved your server it was instantly fixed, I have also moved within the same area since than and seen a further decrease in ping (same ISP), whats going on ;_;

replies.body:
Have you tried all the steps in the [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) guide? I know you've tried a few things, but there's a few other things on there such as checking for packet loss, etc. which I'm not sure if you've tried yet.

Otherwise, if you let me know what ISP you have I can also double check whether or not there's any known issues with your ISP.

Hey there sorry it took me so long to reply, I am still getting the spikes I ran the netalyzer (no packet loss the only real problem was my computer clock being slightly off) and have gone through the whole list. My ISP is Teksavvy Soluions. I will keep trying things and let you know if it resolves thanks for the response.

Hmm...we should be peered with Teksavvy and I haven't heard anything about there being any overall issues with them at the moment.  I'd go ahead and [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can take a closer look at what's going on.  When you send the ticket, be sure to submit the following logs:

* [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)
* [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)
* [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
